definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: These include oysters, clams, mussels and whelks.
sentences.chinese: 這些海產包括牡蠣，文蛤，貽貝和蛾螺。

sentences.english: They eat a lot of seafood and veggies .
sentences.chinese: 他們喫大量的海產品和蔬菜類的食品。

sentences.english: Rotifers are adequate first feeds of larval rearing of marine fish.
sentences.chinese: 輪蟲是海產魚類苗種的適宜開口餌料和優質食物。

sentences.english: Try to avoid eating raw river fish or seafood, or river fish/seafood from just offshore;
sentences.chinese: 儘量避免喫生河魚或海鮮或近海地區的海產品。

sentences.english: Dealing with perishables , such as seafood and produce, is tricky business.
sentences.chinese: 處理易腐類食品是個棘手的問題，例如海產食品。

sentences.english: Seafood is the best source of omega-3 fatty acids, which are probably the best fat of all for your cardiovascular system and all-around health.
sentences.chinese: 海產品是歐米伽3脂肪酸的最佳來源。

sentences.english: Furthermore, recent legislation requires fish sellers to identify the source of seafood.
sentences.chinese: 此外，最近出臺的立法規定魚商要識別海產的來源。

sentences.english: Sanya is around with seas, so there is much seafood.
sentences.chinese: 三亞四面環海，所以有許多的海產品。

sentences.english: Those waters represent seventy-seven percent of Louisiana's total seafood production.
sentences.chinese: 而那一區域佔到了路易斯安那州海產品總量的77%。

sentences.english: My stepmother served salmon for dinner. I'm severely allergic to seafood.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯的時候後媽給上的三文魚，而我喫海產品過敏。

sentences.english: Marched to the city of fish store shop, all kinds of seafood presentation but person.
sentences.chinese: 成行成市的魚商店鋪，各類海產品賣相可人。

sentences.english: These toxins can be deadly to sea animals and also dangerous to people.
sentences.chinese: 這些毒素對海產動物可以致命，對人也有危害。

sentences.english: It is not at levels that are harmful for seafood consumption.
sentences.chinese: 它並沒有達到消費海產食品都有害的水平。

sentences.english: 700 square kilometres of sea are suitable for seafood farming.
sentences.chinese: 適宜海產品養殖的面積達2700平方公里。

sentences.english: Also, people should not eat other kinds of shellfish during a HAB .
sentences.chinese: 同時，人們不應該喫其他有害藻類的貝殼類海產。

sentences.english: It may be the future of seafood.
sentences.chinese: 這有可能成爲未來的海產食品。

definition: reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
to rush like ducks (idiom); the mob scrabbles madly for sth unobtainable/an unruly crowd on a wild goose chase
